meanings.definition: To sing a lullaby to someone to help them fall asleep.
meanings.sent1: She lullabied her baby with a sweet song.
meanings.sent2: The mother lullabied her child every night.
meanings.sent3: The cat lullabied the kittens with a gentle purr.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the waves lullabied me into a peaceful slumber.
meanings.sent5: The soft melody lullabied the entire room into a tranquil state.

meanings.sent1: He remembered the lullabied from his childhood.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful lullabied echoed in the room.
meanings.sent3: The old record player played a nostalgic lullabied.
meanings.sent4: The lullabied brought back memories of bedtime stories.
meanings.sent5: The familiar lullabied filled him with comfort and peace.
